models¶

class gus2.gus_gallery.models.gus_gallery(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

An image gallery belonging to a gus_group.

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception gus_gallery.MultipleObjectsReturned¶
gus_gallery.add_image(img)[source]¶

Adds a given image to the gallery.

gus_gallery.delete()[source]¶

Deletes the gallery and all the images associated with it.

gus_gallery.get_images()[source]¶

Gets an array of images that belong to the gallery.

@rtype: gus_image[] @return: An array of images in the gallery.
